```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
```

```{r scale_stata, cache = TRUE}
dsamp <- diamonds[sample(nrow(diamonds), 1000), ]
(d <- qplot(carat, price, data=dsamp, colour=clarity)
               + theme_bw()
               + scale_color_stata())
(d <- qplot(carat, price, data=dsamp, colour=clarity)
               + theme_bw()
               + scale_color_stata("s1color"))



```
